question:
Your friend is asking for your advice. He is going to university and can't  decide whether to study music or business management. Write a letter
- How you felt when you got the letter
- What the good points are for both sides and
- What your advice is
text: How are you? I hope this letter finds you well and I am very for you to hear about your's successful school completion which would be the best moment in life. I hope we had  good fun throughout our schooling days and those are really unforgettable days.

As you know, the business management course will be all about planning, leadership and decision making related subjects which play a significant role in the competitive market. On the other hand, the music-related subjects will add more fun to our life and  both courses are having their own different topics in the industry.

I knew that you are very smart in  handling crisis management and executing new ideas despite poor performance in social studies. Hence, I would suggest you choose the business management course which would be easy during your course and post-graduation as well.
I wish you all the best for university study and I hope you will consider my suggestion.
